caption: Delicious Italian food, wonderful service and staff. Recommend the Cheesecake. Will be returning. My 3 yr old even ate his food. He does not like much Italian.

Service was fantastic. Quick and pleasant. Veal meatballs were tender and yummy. Pasta was delicious. Spicy margarita was very yummy. Highly recommend!

Food was ok , The waiter didn't make me feel comfortable , He kept looking over to our table, My good friend Norma has frequent this Italian restaurant for year's,  with her late husband , It's a possibility that I may not return to this restaurant, Great  place to frequent I believe,  If they change the waiter that serve us, remember is about the experience that one frequents a place,  i just like to feel like I'm home, I don't care if is a Italian restaurant or a puerto Rican restaurant ,

Me and my family thoroughly enjoyed dining at Marco Polo. We started our meals with appetizers of baked clams, veal meatballs, roasted artichokes, and mozzarella balls wrapped in slices of prosciutto. Every single one of these appetizers was delicious. Our main courses consisted of black linguine with calamari and shrimp, bacalao with a thin tomato sauce and capers, Lobster ravioli, and spaghetti and meatballs. We had dessert, naturally, of tiramisu which was excellent. The service was excellent and the restaurant's Ambiance is very inviting. Go, enjoy, you won't be disappointed.

I had a reservation for Valentine’s Day and didn’t have to wait for my table, although the place was crowded! The place was beautiful with the decorations they added. The service was excellent. The food was delicious and can’t wait to come back!

I love the ambiance and food! The host was extremely pleasant despite a busy hectic February 14th. She kept her cool at all times, quite amazing! Our server was excellent. But the busboy was visibly irrated with us, he kept asking us if we were finished with our appetizers and main course. The first time he came by we said no, he made a face and looked at his wristwatch. Our server came by too, he told us to enjoy our meal, quite a different experience compared with the busboy. We left around 1015-1030, a lot of empty tables so I didnt understand the rush.  Anyway, I'm still giving our experience here 5 stars. House made pasta was hearty--heart shaped ravioli!!! They have a great wine selection. The dessert was pretty delicious too.
HAPPY 50th Joann. Hope you had the time of your life. Thank you for being a Lifelong Friend. Love ya❌💋🎂
Great staff and great food I give it 10 stars !!!
Top notch food, service and atmosphere. The seafood is impeccable. Menu is fresh and tantalizing. Don't miss this gem!
The food was absolutely fantastic and the service was just as good
Awesome grill 🐙octopus😋😋😋😋😋
Food and service were excellent. Attended a private party and everything was great.
Best ambience, service, and food for a reasonable cost! Brought my family from out of town here for the holidays and they left so blessed. Thank you to the staff and everyone at Marco Polos!

(Translated by Google) You eat very well, very nice staff and nice place. As first I tasted the homemade agnolotti with cream and mushrooms, unfortunately only the cream was present, the mushrooms were still on vacation like me and then the pasta was not homemade ; however they use excellent products and the agnolotti were al dente, which is essential for my way of eating. I advise. Service and atmosphere is top notch, but the food is disappointing. Been a few times and it just doesn't deliver the goods. It always seems like it's going to be the best Italian food in the neighborhood and then it's not. Not bad in any way, but not good enough either. I hesitate to criticize this place because I want to love it... but I don't.

Very attentive staff, I can't remember the last time I actually had a professional waiter serve me. The waiter had complete knowledge of the items on the menu. The food was beautifully presented and tasted wonderful. We shall return often.

I had a full course lunch at Marco Polo for a family event. The food and service is very good here. They have a bar, not a BYOB. They have valet service which is a real plus as parking can be difficult in the area. They have access to a garage down the block. The owner who has been in the restaurant business for 36 years, was on premises, which is also a plus. I cannot comment on the prices since I was a guest at a family party so cannot rate it for value. Overall, a nice dining experience.
I tried this spot before with a friend and I am obsessed since then. I enjoyed the awesome ambience and yummy food and beverages. They never disappoint.

Facts: Showed up at 1:55 on a weekend, treating a friend. Noticed the lunch menu displayed outside. Get inside, they bring us Dinner Menus. Don't want a make a scene/get bad food, let it slide. Server throws a fit when we tell him we're going to abstain from Alcohol for the meal. Food comes, fine enough. Server throws a fit when we tell him we're full and going to pass on Dessert. They bring the check (incidentally lunch menu is about 1/2 to 2/3 of dinner menu). I put cash for the tip, pay the bill with a credit card. Couple days later, I see that they billed the credit card for an unauthorized tip. Have to dispute with the credit card company. Irritated, I call the restaurant and ask when lunch ends - answer: 3:30pm. In short, they'll try to rip you off, especially if you are from out of town.
Food was delicious, the staff was wonderful.  Ana kept our grandson entertained. Thank you for a great time!

There are not enough stars to rate this restaurant. The elegance , the ambience and the  Competence of the staff is 1st rate. Now, It's cuisine is AAA and a whole new level  above magnificent. Went there for Thanksgiving dinner.  It was pleasant enough.  The food was tasty and reasonably priced.  The Turkey dinner , however was not special. It reminded me of a TV dinner with similar  presentation.  Glasses of soda were served in wine glasses with ice about 3 oz for $2 .  Service was generally excellent . The upstairs dining room was more of a catering or party hall. Non Thanksgiving items such as steak , ravioli, chicken were a much better value and tasted and looked better.
the ambience and the staff were  very welcoming. The "Ravioli di Zucca" is exceptional.

In some ways, stepping into Marco Polo is like stepping back a few decades. While this is not an unmitigated positive, by and large it's a good thing. Marco Polo is like one of those "fancy" Italian restaurants you went to back in the day, with big red sauce dishes, waiters speaking to you and accents that sound like something out of a movie, and a crowd where necks, biceps, and waists, all appear to be approximately the same size.  The pasta dishes are very good.  Of course they are...
Great food very nice people Joe is a great guy

We were at a party and the food and service was great. We had a good time.
Portions are always ridiculously small. Food is ok . Been there twice and had to go to burger king after becuase i was still hungry.

A must place to eat in bklyn. Fine food at reasonable prices. Food is 5 stars and the service is 5 stars. A great wine list. My girlfriend and I had dinner there and she loved it. Was her 1st time there. An enjoyable evening for both of us. Well worth it.
I loved it. I had a small HS reunion with some old friends. I loved it so much, that we're going to do it again next year!!

Excellent food, excellent service. Capellini with veal meatballs, scallops over black risotto, and clams oreganata, all perfect and flavorful, not salty. Clean, classic, will definitely be back.

Came here for a friend's birthday dinner and it was delish. Plenty of good food options and I opted for the New Zealand rack of lamb. Wasn't disappointed and it wasn't outrageously expensive for a dish either.  They take reservations and a very accommodating for larger groups. Great friendly staff, made it for a great night.

Great Italian food in downtown Brooklyn.  Unlike the majority of restaurants in NYC... Marco Polo has withstood the test of time.   I have been going to Marco Polo for years.  The service and staff are great.   The restaurant is spacious,  and they have an upstairs room for where they cater large parties.  The food is delicious.  When I'm in that neighborhood and looking for a sure bet, I can always count on it for a good dining experience.    The pasta is home made, the hot antipasto is very good,  especially if you like sea food, and the lamb chops are great.

(Translated by Google) I love this Italian restaurant in Brooklyn, it is now a fixed stop on every trip to New York. For some years everything has been renovated, and I must say that it is very beautiful. The owner and chef Marco are exceptional. Typical Italian cuisine of class. Staff always polite and professional, offer an excellent parking service.  (Original) Amo questo ristorante italiano di Brooklyn, Ormai é tappa fissa in ogni viaggio a New York. Da qualche anno é stato ristrutturato tutto, e devo dire che é molto bello. Il proprietario e lo chef Marco sono eccezionali. Cucina tipica italiana di classe. Staff sempre gentile e professionale, offrono un ottimo servizio di parcheggio.

Went there with my mom and girlfriend for Thanksgiving. Considering it was a big holiday day, the service was extremely attentive. The food was what you'd expect for an Italian Thanksgiving, nothing crazy but the menu is solid. We will definitely go back on a day that's not a Holiday just to get the true experience at Marco Polo.
Marco Polo is an elegant restaurant with a great menu and attentive service. The restaurant was packed in Thanksgiving, but Marco and his staff still provided an all around amazing experience.
3rd year in a row for Thanksgiving and it’s as great as ever!

Truly classic Italian restaurant, the owners are very wonderful people and the atmosphere is great.  Their restaurant is beautifully decorated with marble and granite.  Expect nothing but the best from them, you will leave very happy and satisfied.  The menu has a nice variety and they have awesome daily specials.  If you are in Brooklyn and looking for great Italian food and wine, this is the place.

And lastly the food is overpriced for what it is. STAY AWAY
Today 07/30/017 is my first. I love there  environment there works are friendly and there food is really really really good. I am definitely coming back.

Excellent Italian standards with highest quality in Carroll Gardens.  Great date night or large group possibilities, with friendly Italian local service.  The pasta mixed in the parm-wheel was a first for me...great to split.  Our entire meal was top-rated Italian.

Food has been excellent for decades ... Service has always been exceptional.. Probably considered a landmark .... Defiantly a neighborhood staple . neighborhood has become a lot like the village in Manhattan .... Come have a fantastic meal and enjoy the area .

Excellent location and great vibes. Romance in the air in this place! Great for a nice family gathering too. place is beautiful as well, well stocked bar and AMAZING FOOD. only complaint i really have is some of the food is over priced for the portion that you get, and that sometimes you have to wait awhile for servers to come to your table. First time i went service was perfect, they were on top of our every need, cleaned out table of any crumbs as well mid meal - second time we went, we kept having to wait 20 mins to even ask for a glass of water or something. This place is great; if it wasn't for the secong experience, this place would have a 5 star rating.

One of the worst meals I've ever had. They may have upgraded the decor but they downgraded the food. My wife ordered Lasagne Bolanese but there was no meat in it.
